alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 22 at 12:04AM MST until December 23 at 12:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST FRIDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, snow and wind expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches with locally higher amounts. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 50 below zero. * WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains and Flat Tops. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until noon MST Thursday. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 8 PM this evening to noon MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially on ridge tops. Strong winds could cause tree damage. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops
